task.summary: added api-gateway docker file & fixed application.yml
added jwt & token generation & test login endpoint
added validate token test & validate token endpoint
added auth service docs via gateway
added login integration test unauth test
Added rate limiting to api gateway
Removed default-filters in application.yml in api-gateway & added rate limiting test
Installed circuit breaker and configured createBillingAccount method in BillingServiceGrpcClient
Added patient service circuit breaker fallback config in application.properties
Added billing service dependency & proto file in billing-service
Added KafkaConsumer in billing-service & added configs in application.properties
Debugged & tested circuit breaker until 4 in the morning.
Added spring boot actuator&prometheus deps & configs in application.properties in patient-service
Added aspects for cache miss in patient-service
fixed some bugs & tested cache miss metrics
Added get-appointments-by-date-range.http & updated other http request files
Got cached patient details and added it to dto
